HANGOUTS_COPY.description: App headline for hangouts: You can keep in touch with friends using hangouts

HANGOUTS_SUB_COPY.description: A subtitle for Hangouts: supports the headline by giving the app name

HANGOUTS_DESCRIPTION.message: Prata med vänner och familj direkt. Ingen installation, ingen konfiguration, inget krångel.
HANGOUTS_DESCRIPTION.description: Description of Hangouts: Its very easy to talk to people using hangouts, doesn't even need an install

HANGOUTS_SECTION_GROUP_TITLE.description: Feature headline: Headline for group video chat feature

HANGOUTS_SECTION_GROUP_DESCRIPTION.message: Videochatta gratis med upp till nio vänner samtidigt.
HANGOUTS_SECTION_GROUP_DESCRIPTION.description: Feature description: group video chat for free

HANGOUTS_SECTION_NOHASSLE_TITLE.description: Feature headline: No hassles with Hangouts

HANGOUTS_SECTION_NOHASSLE_DESCRIPTION.message: Logga in på din Chromebook och sätt igång. Ingen konfiguration behövs.
HANGOUTS_SECTION_NOHASSLE_DESCRIPTION.description: Feature description: how easy it is to use hangouts on Chromebook as it doesn't need setup

HANGOUTS_SECTION_FUN_TITLE.description: Feature headline: describes fun features of Google Hangouts

HANGOUTS_SECTION_FUN_DESCRIPTION.message: Liva upp videokonferenser med effekter, humörsymboler och YouTube-videoklipp.
HANGOUTS_SECTION_FUN_DESCRIPTION.description: Feature description: describes how you can have a lot of fun with Hangouts

HANGOUTS_HINT_TITLE.message: Hur gör jag om jag använder Skype<sup>®</sup>?
HANGOUTS_HINT_TITLE.description: Question headline: Addresses user concerns if they are Skype users

HANGOUTS_HINT_DESCRIPTION.message: Hangouts är ett lättanvänt alternativ till Skype<sup>®</sup>. Ingen konfiguration krävs. Videochatta gratis med upp till nio personer.
HANGOUTS_HINT_DESCRIPTION.description: Question description: Describes that hangouts can be used instead of Skype on a chromebook

HANGOUTS_BALLOON_SCREENSHARE.message: Visa din skärm för andra med ett enda klick

HANGOUTS_BALLOON_ADD.message: Titta på YouTube-videoklipp, arbeta tillsammans med dokument och lägg till roliga effekter i din videochatt.
HANGOUTS_BALLOON_ADD.description: Add apps tooltip: Describes applications in hangouts

HANGOUTS_BALLOON_INVITE.message: Bjud in andra till din videochatt med hjälp av deras e-postadresser
HANGOUTS_BALLOON_INVITE.description: Invite friends tooltip: Describes how easy it is to add friends

HANGOUTS_BALLOON_PEOPLE.message: Lägg till upp till nio personer i din videochatt utan att installera någon komplicerad programvara
HANGOUTS_BALLOON_PEOPLE.description: Chat area tooltip: describes group video feature by which you can hangout with 9 people for free

HANGOUTS_SHOW_LICENCE.description: Menu string in the context menu.
